DOC.criteria: Diagnosed type 2 diabetes minimum 6 month prior screen ( Visit 1 ) Stable treatment total daily dose least 1000 mg metformin ( without additional oral antidiabetic drug ( OADs ) treatment ) . The metformin dose must unchanged least 3 month prior screen ( Visit 1 ) Stable treatment total daily dose least 100 mg sitagliptin .
